StringReg.Name: DeviceVendorName
StringReg.ToolTip: This feature provides the name of the manufacturer of the device.
StringReg.Description: This feature provides the name of the manufacturer of the device.

StringReg.Name: DeviceModelName
StringReg.ToolTip: This feature provides the model of the device.
StringReg.Description: This feature provides the model of the device.

StringReg.Name: DeviceManufacturerInfo
StringReg.ToolTip: This feature provides extended manufacturer information about the device.
StringReg.Description: This feature provides extended manufacturer information about the device.

StringReg.Name: DeviceVersion
StringReg.ToolTip: This feature provides the version of the device.
StringReg.Description: This feature provides the version of the device.

StringReg.Name: DeviceID
StringReg.ToolTip: This feature stores a camera identifier.
StringReg.Description: This feature stores a camera identifier.

StringReg.Name: DeviceUserID
StringReg.ToolTip: This feature stores a user-programmable identifier.
StringReg.Description: This feature stores a user-programmable identifier.

Integer.Name: SensorWidth
Integer.ToolTip: This feature indicates the effective width of the sensor in pixels.
Integer.Description: This feature indicates the effective width of the sensor in pixels.

Integer.Name: SensorHeight
Integer.ToolTip: This feature indicates the effective height of the sensor in pixels.
Integer.Description: This feature indicates the effective height of the sensor in pixels.

Integer.Name: Width
Integer.ToolTip: This feature represents the actual image width expelled by the camera (in pixels).
Integer.Description: This feature represents the actual image width expelled by the camera (in pixels).

Integer.Name: Height
Integer.ToolTip: This feature represents the actual image height expelled by the camera (in pixels).
Integer.Description: This feature represents the actual image height expelled by the camera (in pixels).

Integer.Name: DecimationHorizontal
Integer.ToolTip: This feature allows horizontal sub-sampling of the image.
Integer.Description: This feature allows horizontal sub-sampling of the image.

Integer.Name: DecimationVertical
Integer.ToolTip: This feature allows vertical sub-sampling of the image.
Integer.Description: This feature allows vertical sub-sampling of the image.

Enumeration.Name: PixelFormat
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature indicates the format of the pixel to use during the acquisition.
Enumeration.Description: This feature indicates the format of the pixel to use during the acquisition.

Enumeration.Name: PixelCoding
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature indicates the coding of the pixels in the image.
Enumeration.Description: This feature indicates the coding of the pixels in the image.

Enumeration.Name: PixelSize
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature indicates the total size in bits of a pixel of the image.
Enumeration.Description: This feature indicates the total size in bits of a pixel of the image.

Enumeration.Name: PixelColorFilter
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature indicates the type of color filter that is applied to the image.
Enumeration.Description: This feature indicates the type of color filter that is applied to the image.

Enumeration.Name: TestImageSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature selects the type of test image that is expelled by the camera.
Enumeration.Description: This feature selects the type of test image that is expelled by the camera.

Integer.Name: OffsetX
Integer.ToolTip: ToolTip
Integer.Description: Description

Integer.Name: OffsetY
Integer.ToolTip: ToolTip
Integer.Description: Description

Enumeration.Name: AcquisitionMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature controls the acquisition mode of the device.
Enumeration.Description: This feature controls the acquisition mode of the device.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStart
Command.ToolTip: This feature starts the Acquisition of the device.
Command.Description: This feature starts the Acquisition of the device.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStop
Command.ToolTip: This feature stops the Acquisition of the device at the end of the current Frame.
Command.Description: This feature stops the Acquisition of the device at the end of the current Frame.

Integer.Name: PayloadSize
Integer.ToolTip: PayloadSize provides the number of bytes transferred for each image on the stream channel, including any end-of-line, end-of-frame statistics or other stamp data.
Integer.Description: PayloadSize provides the number of bytes transferred for each image on the stream channel, including any end-of-line, end-of-frame statistics or other stamp data.

Integer.Name: GevVersionMajor
Integer.ToolTip: This field represents the major version of the specification.
Integer.Description: This field represents the major version of the specification.

Integer.Name: GevVersionMinor
Integer.ToolTip: This field represents the minor version of the specification.
Integer.Description: This field represents the minor version of the specification.

Boolean.Name: GevDeviceModeIsBigEndian
Boolean.ToolTip: Endianess might be used to interpret multi-byte data for READMEM and WRITEMEM commands.
Boolean.Description: Endianess might be used to interpret multi-byte data for READMEM and WRITEMEM commands.

Enumeration.Name: GevDeviceModeCharacterSet
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature represents the character set used by all the strings of the bootstrap registers.
Enumeration.Description: This feature represents the character set used by all the strings of the bootstrap registers.

Integer.Name: GevInterfaceSelector
Integer.ToolTip: This feature is a Selector that indicates to which physical network interface other features must reference.
Integer.Description: This feature is a Selector that indicates to which physical network interface other features must reference.

Integer.Name: GevMACAddress
Integer.ToolTip: This feature stores the MAC address of the given network interface.
Integer.Description: This feature stores the MAC address of the given network interface.

Integer.Name: GevMACAddressHigh
Integer.ToolTip: This feature stores the upper two bytes of the MAC address of the given network interface.
Integer.Description: This feature stores the upper two bytes of the MAC address of the given network interface.

Integer.Name: GevMACAddressLow
Integer.ToolTip: This feature stores the lower four bytes of the MAC address of the given network interface.
Integer.Description: This feature stores the lower four bytes of the MAC address of the given network interface.

Boolean.Name: GevSupportedIPConfigurationLLA
Boolean.ToolTip: This feature indicates if Link Local Address IP configuration scheme is supported by the given network interface.
Boolean.Description: This feature indicates if Link Local Address IP configuration scheme is supported by the given network interface.

Boolean.Name: GevSupportedIPConfigurationDHCP
Boolean.ToolTip: This feature indicates if DHCP IP configuration scheme is supported by the given network interface.
Boolean.Description: This feature indicates if DHCP IP configuration scheme is supported by the given network interface.

Boolean.Name: GevSupportedIPConfigurationPersistentIP
Boolean.ToolTip: This feature indicates if PersistentIP configuration scheme is supported by the given network interface.
Boolean.Description: This feature indicates if PersistentIP configuration scheme is supported by the given network interface.

Boolean.Name: GevCurrentIPConfigurationLLA
Boolean.ToolTip: This feature indicates if Link Local Address IP configuration scheme is activated on the given network interface.
Boolean.Description: This feature indicates if Link Local Address IP configuration scheme is activated on the given network interface.

Boolean.Name: GevCurrentIPConfigurationDHCP
Boolean.ToolTip: This feature indicates if DHCP IP configuration scheme is activated on the given network interface.
Boolean.Description: This feature indicates if DHCP IP configuration scheme is activated on the given network interface.

Boolean.Name: GevCurrentIPConfigurationPersistentIP
Boolean.ToolTip: This feature indicates if PersistentIP configuration scheme is activated on the given network interface.
Boolean.Description: This feature indicates if PersistentIP configuration scheme is activated on the given network interface.

Integer.Name: GevCurrentIPAddress
Integer.ToolTip: This feature reports the IP address for the given network interface once it has been configured.
Integer.Description: This feature reports the IP address for the given network interface once it has been configured.

Integer.Name: GevCurrentSubnetMask
Integer.ToolTip: This feature provides the subnet mask of the given interface.
Integer.Description: This feature provides the subnet mask of the given interface.

Integer.Name: GevCurrentDefaultGateway
Integer.ToolTip: This feature indicates the default gateway IP address to be used on the given network interface.
Integer.Description: This feature indicates the default gateway IP address to be used on the given network interface.

StringReg.Name: GevFirstURL
StringReg.ToolTip: This feature stores the first URL to the XML device description file.
StringReg.Description: This feature stores the first URL to the XML device description file.

StringReg.Name: GevSecondURL
StringReg.ToolTip: This feature stores the second URL to the XML device description file.
StringReg.Description: This feature stores the second URL to the XML device description file.

Integer.Name: GevNumberOfInterfaces
Integer.ToolTip: This feature indicates the number of physical network interfaces supported by this device.
Integer.Description: This feature indicates the number of physical network interfaces supported by this device.

Integer.Name: GevPersistentIPAddress
Integer.ToolTip: This feature indicates the Persistent IP address for this network interface.
Integer.Description: This feature indicates the Persistent IP address for this network interface.

Integer.Name: GevPersistentSubnetMask
Integer.ToolTip: This feature indicates the Persistent subnet mask associated with the Persistent IP address on this network interface.
Integer.Description: This feature indicates the Persistent subnet mask associated with the Persistent IP address on this network interface.

Integer.Name: GevPersistentDefaultGateway
Integer.ToolTip: This feature indicates the persistent default gateway for this network interface.
Integer.Description: This feature indicates the persistent default gateway for this network interface.

Integer.Name: GevMessageChannelCount
Integer.ToolTip: This feature reports the number of message channels supported by this device.
Integer.Description: This feature reports the number of message channels supported by this device.

Integer.Name: GevStreamChannelCount
Integer.ToolTip: This feature reports the number of stream channels supported by this device.
Integer.Description: This feature reports the number of stream channels supported by this device.

Boolean.Name: GevSupportedOptionalCommandsConcatenation
Boolean.ToolTip: Multiple operations in a single message are supported.
Boolean.Description: Multiple operations in a single message are supported.

Integer.Name: GevHeartbeatTimeout
Integer.ToolTip: This feature indicates the current heartbeat timeout in milliseconds.
Integer.Description: This feature indicates the current heartbeat timeout in milliseconds.

Integer.Name: GevTimestampTickFrequency
Integer.ToolTip: This 64-bit feature indicates the number of timestamp ticks during 1 second.
Integer.Description: This 64-bit feature indicates the number of timestamp ticks during 1 second.

Integer.Name: GevTimestampTickFrequencyHigh
Integer.ToolTip: This feature indicates the 32 most significant bits of the number of timestamp ticks during 1 second.
Integer.Description: This feature indicates the 32 most significant bits of the number of timestamp ticks during 1 second.

Integer.Name: GevTimestampTickFrequencyLow
Integer.ToolTip: This feature indicates the 32 least significant bits of the number of timestamp ticks during 1 second.
Integer.Description: This feature indicates the 32 least significant bits of the number of timestamp ticks during 1 second.

Command.Name: GevTimestampControlLatch
Command.ToolTip: Latch current timestamp counter into "Timestamp value" register.
Command.Description: Latch current timestamp counter into "Timestamp value" register.

Integer.Name: GevTimestampControl
Integer.ToolTip: This register is used to control the timestamp counter.
Integer.Description: This register is used to control the timestamp counter.

Integer.Name: GevTimestampValue
Integer.ToolTip: This feature reports the latched 64-bit value of the timestamp counter.
Integer.Description: This feature reports the latched 64-bit value of the timestamp counter.

Integer.Name: GevTimestampValueHigh
Integer.ToolTip: This feature reports the 32 most significant bits of the latched value of the timestamp counter.
Integer.Description: This feature reports the 32 most significant bits of the latched value of the timestamp counter.

Integer.Name: GevTimestampValueLow
Integer.ToolTip: This feature reports the 32 least significant bits of the latched value of the timestamp counter.
Integer.Description: This feature reports the 32 least significant bits of the latched value of the timestamp counter.

Enumeration.Name: GevCCP
Enumeration.ToolTip: This feature is used to grant privilege to an application.
Enumeration.Description: This feature is used to grant privilege to an application.

Integer.Name: GevMCPHostPort
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the port to which the device must send messages.
Integer.Description: Indicates the port to which the device must send messages.

Integer.Name: GevMCDA
Integer.ToolTip: This feature indicates the destination IP address for the message channel.
Integer.Description: This feature indicates the destination IP address for the message channel.

Integer.Name: GevMCTT
Integer.ToolTip: This feature provides the transmission timeout value in milliseconds.
Integer.Description: This feature provides the transmission timeout value in milliseconds.

Integer.Name: GevMCRC
Integer.ToolTip: This feature indicates the number of retransmissions allowed when a message channel message times out.
Integer.Description: This feature indicates the number of retransmissions allowed when a message channel message times out.

Integer.Name: GevStreamChannelSelector
Integer.ToolTip: This Selector is used to index into the various stream channel features.
Integer.Description: This Selector is used to index into the various stream channel features.

Integer.Name: GevSCPInterfaceIndex
Integer.ToolTip: Index of network interface to use (from 0 to 3).
Integer.Description: Index of network interface to use (from 0 to 3).

Integer.Name: GevSCPHostPort
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the port to which the device must send data stream.
Integer.Description: Indicates the port to which the device must send data stream.

Boolean.Name: GevSCPSFireTestPacket
Boolean.ToolTip: When this bit is set, the device will fire one test packet.
Boolean.Description: When this bit is set, the device will fire one test packet.

Boolean.Name: GevSCPSDoNotFragment
Boolean.ToolTip: This bit is copied into the "do not fragment" bit of IP header of each stream packet.
Boolean.Description: This bit is copied into the "do not fragment" bit of IP header of each stream packet.

Boolean.Name: GevSCPSBigEndian
Boolean.ToolTip: Endianess of multi-byte pixel data for this stream.
Boolean.Description: Endianess of multi-byte pixel data for this stream.

Integer.Name: GevSCPSPacketSize
Integer.ToolTip: The stream packet size to send on this channel, except for data leader and data trailer; and the last data packet which might be of smaller size (since packet size is not necessarily a multiple of block size for stream channel).
Integer.Description: The stream packet size to send on this channel, except for data leader and data trailer; and the last data packet which might be of smaller size (since packet size is not necessarily a multiple of block size for stream channel).

Integer.Name: GevSCPD
Integer.ToolTip: This feature indicates the delay (in timestamp counter unit) to insert between each packet for this stream channel.
Integer.Description: This feature indicates the delay (in timestamp counter unit) to insert between each packet for this stream channel.

Integer.Name: GevSCDA
Integer.ToolTip: This feature indicates the destination IP address for this stream channel.
Integer.Description: This feature indicates the destination IP address for this stream channel.

Integer.Name: TLParamsLocked
Integer.ToolTip: Integer parameter: 1 when grabbing, 0 when not

Port.Name: Device
Port.ToolTip: Port giving access to the device.
